text: @piersmorgan @nytimes What you won’t see in the press @piersmorgan is how my grandad died of COVID-19 without his family there with him. WW2 veteran. Met the pope. Served tea to the queen and lived an extraordinary life. A remarkable man, an incredible man. Someone I’m so proud of.
